r.s: Provides functionality to dump the internal representation of PHP scripts
r.d: The Vulcan Logic Disassembler hooks into the Zend Engine and dumps all the opcodes (execution units) of a script.
r.n: - Remove 'ZEND_' prefix from opcode names - PHP 8.5: Add support for the new DECLARE_ATTRIBUTED_CONST opcode - Improve support for PHP 8.4 property hooks, and add the new INIT_PARENT_PROPERTY_HOOK_CALL opcode - Fixed EXT_STMT display, as it does not have any used op nodes
